class LabourContract:
    def __init__(self, id: str, full_name: str, position: str, basic_salary: int, allowance = 0, day_start = "01/01/2025"):
        self.id = id
        self.full_name = full_name
        self.position = position
        self.day_start = day_start
        self.year_start = int(self.day_start[-4:])
        self.working_year = 2025 - self.year_start
        self.basic_salary = basic_salary
        self.allowance = allowance

        self.reward = 0
        self.project = None
        self.project_reward()

        self.income = 0
        self.calculate_income

        self.senority_allowance = 0
        self.calculate_senority_allowance()

        self.position_allowance = 3000000 if self.position.lower() == "quáº£n lÃ½ dá»± Ã¡n" else 0

    def project_reward(self):
        if self.project == "Dá»± Ã¡n trong nÆ°á»›c":
            self.reward = 0.1 * self.basic_salary
        elif self.project == "Dá»± Ã¡n khÃ¡ch hÃ ng nÆ°á»›c ngoÃ i":
            self.reward = 0.2 * self.basic_salary
        elif self.project == "Dá»± Ã¡n chiáº¿n lÆ°á»£c":
            self.reward = 0.3 * self.basic_salary

    def get_id(self):
        return self.id

    def get_basic_salary(self):
        return self.basic_salary

    def calculate_income(self):
        self.income = self.basic_salary + self.allowance + self.reward

    def calculate_tax(self):
        return 0.1 * (self.income - 11000000) if self.income >= 11000000 else 0

    def calculate_senority_allowance(self):
        if self.working_year > 5:
            self.senority_allowance = 5000000
        elif self.working_year > 10:
            self.senority_allowance = 10000000

class Employment_Contract:
    def __init__(self, Contract_ID, Employ_Name, Type_Job, Start_Date, Basic_Salary, Allowance):
        self.ConTract_ID = "HÄNV" + Contract_ID
        self.Employ_Name = Employ_Name
        self.Type_Job = Type_Job
        self.Start_Date = Start_Date
        self.Basic_Salary = Basic_Salary
        self.Allowance = Allowance

    def Get_Contract_ID(self):
        return self.ConTract_ID

    def Get_Basic_Salary(self):
        return self.Basic_Salary

    def Default(self):
        self.ConTract_ID = "HÄNV1023"
        self.Employ_Name = "Nguyá»…n VÄƒn A"
        self.Type_Job = "Láº­p trÃ¬nh viÃªn"
        self.Start_Date = 2025/3/1
        self.Basic_Salary = 15000000
        self.Allowance = 2000000

    def Init2(self, Contract_ID, Employ_Name, Job_Type, Basic_Salary):
        self.ConTract_ID = "HÄNV" + Contract_ID
        self.Employ_Name = Employ_Name
        self.Type_Job = Job_Type
        self.Start_Date = 2025/1/1
        self.Basic_Salary = Basic_Salary
        self.Allowance = 0

    def Income(self, Project_Type):
        Project_Bonus = Project_Type * self.Basic_Salary
        self.Total_Income = self.Basic_Salary + self.Allowance + Project_Bonus
        return self.Total_Income

    def Tax(self):
        Tax_Rate = 0.1
        if self.Total_Income > 11000000:
            self.Tax_Amount = Tax_Rate * self.Total_Income
            return self.Tax_Amount
        return 0

    def Support(self):
        Quantity_Contract = int(input("Nháº­p sá»‘ lÆ°á»£ng há»£p Ä‘á»“ng tham gia: "))
        Working_Time = int(2025 - self.Start_Date)
        self.Support_Amount = 0
        if 10 > Working_Time >= 5:
            self.Support_Amount = 5000000
        elif Working_Time >= 10:
            self.Support_Amount = 10000000
        if self.Type_Job == "Quáº£n lÃ½ dá»± Ã¡n":
            self.Support_Amount += 3000000 * Quantity_Contract
        return self.Support_Amount


def main():
    print("""Loáº¡i dá»± Ã¡n:
          1.Dá»± Ã¡n trong nÆ°á»›c
          2.Dá»± Ã¡n khÃ¡ch hÃ ng nÆ°á»›c ngoÃ i

        Num = 0.2

        Num = 0.3

    print(Contract.Tax())
    print(Contract.Support())

# ChÆ°a bao gá»“m kiá»ƒm tra dá»¯ liá»‡u Ä‘áº§u vÃ o
from datetime import date

class Contract:

    def __init__(self):
        self.flag()
        self.project_reward = 0

    # Há»i user cÃ³ muá»‘n táº¡o há»£p Ä‘á»“ng máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh hay ko
    def flag(self):
        self.flagin = input("Báº¡n cÃ³ muá»‘n táº¡o há»£p Ä‘á»“ng máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh? (y/n): ")
        if self.flagin == "y" or self.flagin == "Y":
            self.default_input()
        elif self.flagin == "n" or self.flagin == "N":
            self.typein_input()

    # Khá»Ÿi táº¡o há»£p Ä‘á»“ng máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh vÃ  cÃ³ tham sá»‘
    def default_input(self):
        self.contractID = "HÄNV1023"
        self.name = "Nguyá»…n VÄƒn A"
        self.position = "Láº­p trÃ¬nh viÃªn"
        self.startdate = [1, 3, 2025]
        self.basic_salary = 15000000
        self.allowance = 2000000

    def typein_input(self):
        self.contractID = input("Nháº­p mÃ£ há»£p Ä‘á»“ng (HÄNVxxxx): ")
        self.name = input("Nháº­p há» tÃªn nhÃ¢n viÃªn: ")
        self.position = input("Nháº­p vá»‹ trÃ­ nhÃ¢n viÃªn: ")
        self.startdate = [1, 1, 2025]
        self.basic_salary = int(input("Nháº­p má»©c lÆ°Æ¡ng cÆ¡ báº£n cá»§a nhÃ¢n viÃªn: "))
        self.allowance = 0

    # Láº¥y thÃ´ng tin mÃ£ há»£p Ä‘á»“ng vÃ  má»©c lÆ°Æ¡ng cÆ¡ báº£n
    def getinfo(self):
        print(f"""
MÃ£ há»£p Ä‘á»“ng: {self.contractID}
Má»©c lÆ°Æ¡ng cÆ¡ báº£n: {self.basic_salary}
""")

    # TÃ­nh tá»•ng thu nháº­p cá»§a nhÃ¢n viÃªn
    def what_project(self):
        print("""CÃ¡c loáº¡i dá»± Ã¡n:
1. Dá»± Ã¡n trong nÆ°á»›c
2. Dá»± Ã¡n khÃ¡ch hÃ ng nÆ°á»›c ngoÃ i
3. Dá»± Ã¡n chiáº¿n lÆ°á»£c
""")
        self.project_type = int(input("NhÃ¢n viÃªn tham gia loáº¡i dá»± Ã¡n nÃ o? (Chá»n 1/2/3): "))
        if self.project_type == 1:
            self.project_reward = 10
        elif self.project_type == 2:
            self.project_reward = 20
        elif self.project_type == 3:
            self.project_reward = 30
        else:
            print("Äáº§u vÃ o khÃ´ng há»£p lá»‡. Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh thÆ°á»Ÿng dá»± Ã¡n lÃ  0%")

    def total_income(self):
        return self.basic_salary * (1 + self.project_reward / 100) + self.allowance

    # TÃ­nh thuáº¿ TNCN
    def income_tax(self, income):
        return 0.1 * (income - 11000000)

    # ChÃ­nh sÃ¡ch há»— trá»£
    def support(self):
        current_year = date.today().year
        year_worked = self.startdate[2] - current_year
        if year_worked >= 10:
            print("ÄÆ°á»£c há»— trá»£ 10.000.000 VND/nÄƒm")
        elif year_worked >= 5:
            print("ÄÆ°á»£c há»— trá»£ 5.000.000 VND/nÄƒm")

        if self.position == "Quáº£n lÃ½ dá»± Ã¡n":
            print("ÄÆ°á»£c há»— trá»£ thÃªm 3.000.000 VND má»—i há»£p Ä‘á»“ng")


def main():
    print("\n---Nháº­p thÃ´ng tin---")
    contract = Contract()

    print("\n---Láº¥y thÃ´ng tin: MÃ£ há»£p Ä‘á»“ng, Má»©c lÆ°Æ¡ng cÆ¡ báº£n---")
    contract.getinfo()

    print("\n---TÃ­nh tá»•ng thu nháº­p cá»§a nhÃ¢n viÃªn---")
    contract.what_project()
    income = contract.total_income()
    print(f"Tá»•ng thu nháº­p cá»§a nhÃ¢n viÃªn lÃ  {income} VND")

    print("\n---TÃ­nh thuáº¿ TNCN---")
    print(f"Thuáº¿ TNCN cá»§a nhÃ¢n viÃªn lÃ  {contract.income_tax(income)}")

    print("\n---ChÃ­nh sÃ¡ch há»— trá»£---")
    contract.support()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

BÃ i viáº¿t cÃ³ tá»• chá»©c tá»‘t, sá»­ dá»¥ng class rÃµ rÃ ng vÃ  tÃ¡ch hÃ m há»£p lÃ½.
CÃ³ phÃ¢n biá»‡t giá»¯a khá»Ÿi táº¡o máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh vÃ  nháº­p tá»« ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng.
TÃ¡ch biá»‡t chá»©c nÄƒng tá»«ng pháº§n: nháº­p dá»¯ liá»‡u, tÃ­nh thu nháº­p, thuáº¿, há»— trá»£.

ChÆ°a chuáº©n hÃ³a xá»­ lÃ½ dá»¯ liá»‡u ngÃ y thÃ¡ng, nÃªn `startdate` chá»‰ lÃ  danh sÃ¡ch `[ngÃ y, thÃ¡ng, nÄƒm]`, khÃ´ng tiá»‡n so sÃ¡nh.
Thuáº¿ TNCN khÃ´ng cÃ³ Ä‘iá»u kiá»‡n kiá»ƒm tra thu nháº­p vÆ°á»£t 11tr má»›i Ä‘Ã¡nh thuáº¿.
ChÆ°a xá»­ lÃ½ Ä‘Æ°á»£c sá»‘ há»£p Ä‘á»“ng cho há»— trá»£ quáº£n lÃ½ dá»± Ã¡n (pháº£i nháº­p sá»‘ há»£p Ä‘á»“ng).

ğŸ’¡ Gá»£i Ã½ cáº£i thiá»‡n:
- NÃªn dÃ¹ng `datetime.date` cho `startdate` thay vÃ¬ danh sÃ¡ch.

- CÃ¢n nháº¯c tÃ¡ch input ra khá»i class Ä‘á»ƒ dá»… test vÃ  tÃ¡i sá»­ dá»¥ng class `Contract`.

ğŸ‘‰ Tá»•ng thá»ƒ: BÃ i viáº¿t Ä‘Ãºng cáº¥u trÃºc, rÃµ rÃ ng, há»£p lÃ½ nhÆ°ng cÃ²n nhiá»u lá»—i logic nhá» cáº§n chá»‰nh Ä‘á»ƒ cháº¡y chÃ­nh xÃ¡c vÃ  hoÃ n thiá»‡n hÆ¡n.

@classmethod
def init_with_defaults(cls, ID, name, pos, basesalary):
    return cls(
        ID,
        name,
        pos,
        "01/01/2025",
        basesalary,
        0
    )


def get_contract_id(self):
    return self._ID


def set_contract_id(self, ID):
    if len(ID) == 8 and ID.startswith("HÄNV") and ID[4:].isdigit():
        self._ID = ID
    else:
        raise ValueError("Invalid contract ID")


def get_base_salary(self):
    return self._basesalary


def set_base_salary(self, basesalary):
    if basesalary > 0:
        self._basesalary = basesalary
    else:
        raise ValueError("Base salary must be > 0")


def calculate_income(self, projectType):
    bonus = 0
    ptype = projectType.lower()
    if ptype == "trong nuoc":
        bonus = 0.1 * self._basesalary
    elif ptype == "nuoc ngoai":
        bonus = 0.2 * self._basesalary
    elif ptype == "chien luoc":
        bonus = 0.3 * self._basesalary
    return self._basesalary + self.allowance + bonus


def calculate_income_tax(self, projectType):
    totalincome = self.calculate_income(projectType)
    deduction = 11000000
    taxable = max(totalincome - deduction, 0)
    tax = 0.1 * taxable
    return tax


def calculate_support(self, isMngr=False):
    currYr = datetime.now().year
    yrsWorked = currYr - self.startdate.year
    supp = 0

    if yrsWorked > 10:
        supp += 10000000 * yrsWorked
    elif yrsWorked > 5:
        supp += 5000000 * yrsWorked
    if isMngr:
        supp += 3000000
    return supp


def __str__(self):
    return (
        f"Contract ID: {self._ID}, Name: {self.name}, Position: {self.pos}, "
        f"Base Salary: {self._basesalary:,} VND, Allowance: {self.allowance:,} VND, "
        f"Start Date: {self.startdate.strftime('%d/%m/%Y')}"
    )

Khá»Ÿi táº¡o Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng báº±ng constructor cÃ³ tham sá»‘ há»£p lÃ½, xá»­ lÃ½ Ä‘Ãºng kiá»ƒu dá»¯ liá»‡u.

ChÃ­nh sÃ¡ch há»— trá»£ tÃ­nh theo sá»‘ nÄƒm lÃ m viá»‡c vÃ  vá»‹ trÃ­ quáº£n lÃ½, cÃ i Ä‘áº·t chÃ­nh xÃ¡c.

- Thiáº¿u hoÃ n toÃ n `getter/setter` vÃ  rÃ ng buá»™c kiá»ƒm tra Ä‘á»‹nh dáº¡ng mÃ£ há»£p Ä‘á»“ng hoáº·c lÆ°Æ¡ng.

- NgÃ y báº¯t Ä‘áº§u há»£p Ä‘á»“ng xá»­ lÃ½ báº±ng chuá»—i, dá»… sai náº¿u Ä‘á»‹nh dáº¡ng Ä‘áº§u vÃ o khÃ´ng Ä‘Ãºng.

from datetime import datetime
class HopDongLaoDong:
    def __init__(self, ma_hop_dong="HÄNV1023", ho_ten_nhan_vien="Nguyá»…n VÄƒn A",
                 vi_tri_cong_viec="Láº­p trÃ¬nh viÃªn", ngay_bat_dau_hop_dong="01/03/2025",
                 muc_luong_co_ban=15000000, phu_cap=2000000):
        self.set_ma_hop_dong(ma_hop_dong)
        self.ho_ten_nhan_vien = ho_ten_nhan_vien
        self.vi_tri_cong_viec = vi_tri_cong_viec
        self.ngay_bat_dau_hop_dong = ngay_bat_dau_hop_dong
        self.set_muc_luong_co_ban(muc_luong_co_ban)
        self.phu_cap = phu_cap

    def set_ma_hop_dong(self, ma):
        if len(ma) == 8 and ma.startswith("HÄNV") and ma[4:].isdigit():
            self.__ma_hop_dong = ma
        else:
            print("MÃ£ há»£p Ä‘á»“ng khÃ´ng há»£p lá»‡. Pháº£i báº¯t Ä‘áº§u báº±ng 'HÄNV' vÃ  theo sau lÃ  4 chá»¯ sá»‘.")

    def get_ma_hop_dong(self):
        return self.__ma_hop_dong

    def set_muc_luong_co_ban(self, luong):
        if luong > 0:
            self.__muc_luong_co_ban = luong
        else:
            print("Má»©c lÆ°Æ¡ng cÆ¡ báº£n pháº£i lÃ  sá»‘ dÆ°Æ¡ng.")

    def get_muc_luong_co_ban(self):
        return self.__muc_luong_co_ban

    def nhap_hop_dong(self, ma_hd, ho_ten, vi_tri, luong):
        self.set_ma_hop_dong(ma_hd)
        self.ho_ten_nhan_vien = ho_ten
        self.vi_tri_cong_viec = vi_tri
        self.ngay_bat_dau_hop_dong = "01/01/2025"
        self.set_muc_luong_co_ban(luong)
        self.phu_cap = 0

    def tinh_tong_thu_nhap(self, loai_du_an):
        thuong = 0
        if loai_du_an == "trong nÆ°á»›c":
            thuong = 0.10 * self.__muc_luong_co_ban
        elif loai_du_an == "khÃ¡ch hÃ ng nÆ°á»›c ngoÃ i":
            thuong = 0.20 * self.__muc_luong_co_ban
        elif loai_du_an == "chiáº¿n lÆ°á»£c":
            thuong = 0.30 * self.__muc_luong_co_ban
        else:
            print("Loáº¡i dá»± Ã¡n khÃ´ng há»£p lá»‡.")
        return self.__muc_luong_co_ban + self.phu_cap + thuong

    def tinh_thue_tncn(self, loai_du_an):
        tong_thu_nhap = self.tinh_tong_thu_nhap(loai_du_an)
        giam_tru = 11000000
        thue = 0.10 * max(tong_thu_nhap - giam_tru, 0)
        return thue

    def chinh_sach_ho_tro(self):
        try:
            ngay_bat_dau = datetime.strptime(self.ngay_bat_dau_hop_dong, "%d/%m/%Y")
            hien_tai = datetime.now()
            so_nam = (hien_tai - ngay_bat_dau).days // 365
        except:
            print("NgÃ y báº¯t Ä‘áº§u há»£p Ä‘á»“ng khÃ´ng há»£p lá»‡.")
            return 0

        ho_tro = 0
        if so_nam > 10:
            ho_tro += so_nam * 10000000
        elif so_nam > 5:
            ho_tro += so_nam * 5000000

        if "quáº£n lÃ½" in self.vi_tri_cong_viec.lower():
            ho_tro += 3000000

        return ho_tro

    def hien_thi_thong_tin(self):
        print(f"MÃ£ HÄ: {self.get_ma_hop_dong()}")
        print(f"Há» tÃªn: {self.ho_ten_nhan_vien}")
        print(f"Vá»‹ trÃ­: {self.vi_tri_cong_viec}")
        print(f"NgÃ y báº¯t Ä‘áº§u: {self.ngay_bat_dau_hop_dong}")
        print(f"LÆ°Æ¡ng cÆ¡ báº£n: {self.get_muc_luong_co_ban():,} VND")
        print(f"Phá»¥ cáº¥p: {self.phu_cap:,} VND")
        print(f"Há»— trá»£ thÃªm: {self.chinh_sach_ho_tro():,} VND")

Sá»­ dá»¥ng constructor máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh vÃ  constructor cÃ³ tham sá»‘ thÃ´ng qua `nhap_hop_dong()`.
CÃ³ `setter/getter` Ä‘á»ƒ kiá»ƒm tra mÃ£ há»£p Ä‘á»“ng vÃ  má»©c lÆ°Æ¡ng.
TÃ­nh tá»•ng thu nháº­p theo tá»«ng loáº¡i dá»± Ã¡n Ä‘Ãºng, thÆ°á»Ÿng rÃµ rÃ ng.
Thuáº¿ TNCN Ä‘Æ°á»£c tÃ­nh Ä‘Ãºng cÃ´ng thá»©c vá»›i má»©c giáº£m trá»«.
ChÃ­nh sÃ¡ch há»— trá»£ cÃ³ xá»­ lÃ½ ngÃ y há»£p Ä‘á»“ng báº±ng `datetime`, ráº¥t há»£p lÃ½.

- `so_nam` tÃ­nh sá»‘ nÄƒm lÃ m viá»‡c nhÆ°ng chÆ°a kiá»ƒm tra náº¿u Ã¢m (há»£p Ä‘á»“ng tÆ°Æ¡ng lai).
- `chinh_sach_ho_tro()` khÃ´ng yÃªu cáº§u sá»‘ lÆ°á»£ng há»£p Ä‘á»“ng quáº£n lÃ½ => thiáº¿u yáº¿u tá»‘ tÃ­nh Ä‘Ãºng 3tr/há»£p Ä‘á»“ng.
- KhÃ´ng xá»­ lÃ½ cÃ¡c giÃ¡ trá»‹ Ä‘áº§u vÃ o tá»« ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng â€” táº¥t cáº£ dÃ¹ng máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh.
- Náº¿u `set_ma_hop_dong` sai Ä‘á»‹nh dáº¡ng, chÆ°Æ¡ng trÃ¬nh váº«n cháº¡y tiáº¿p mÃ  khÃ´ng gÃ¡n giÃ¡ trá»‹ há»£p lá»‡.

Gá»£i Ã½:
- NÃªn thÃªm pháº§n nháº­p thÃ´ng tin tá»« ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng Ä‘á»ƒ bÃ i hoÃ n chá»‰nh hÆ¡n.
- Xá»­ lÃ½ lá»—i cho `set_ma_hop_dong` báº±ng cÃ¡ch raise Exception hoáº·c dÃ¹ng giÃ¡ trá»‹ máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh há»£p lá»‡.
- Bá»• sung sá»‘ há»£p Ä‘á»“ng náº¿u lÃ  quáº£n lÃ½ dá»± Ã¡n Ä‘á»ƒ chÃ­nh sÃ¡ch há»— trá»£ chÃ­nh xÃ¡c hÆ¡n.

Tá»•ng thá»ƒ: BÃ i lÃ m cháº¯c tay, thá»ƒ hiá»‡n hiá»ƒu rÃµ yÃªu cáº§u vÃ  ká»¹ thuáº­t OOP. Má»™t sá»‘ pháº§n cáº§n bá»• sung thÃªm tÃ­nh linh hoáº¡t vÃ  tÆ°Æ¡ng tÃ¡c vá»›i ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng Ä‘á»ƒ hoÃ n chá»‰nh hÆ¡n.

BÃ i lÃ m:
class HopDongLaoDong:
    def __init__(self, ma_hd, ho_ten, vi_tri, ngay_bat_dau, luong_cb, phu_cap):
        self.ma_hd = ma_hd
        self.ho_ten = ho_ten
        self.vi_tri = vi_tri
        self.ngay_bat_dau = int(ngay_bat_dau.split("/")[-1])
        self.luong_cb = float(luong_cb)
        self.phu_cap = float(phu_cap)

    def tinh_tong_thu_nhap(self, loai_du_an):
        thuong = 0
        if loai_du_an == "trong nuoc":
            thuong = 0.1 * self.luong_cb
        elif loai_du_an == "nuoc ngoai":
            thuong = 0.2 * self.luong_cb
        elif loai_du_an == "chien luoc":
            thuong = 0.3 * self.luong_cb
        return self.luong_cb + self.phu_cap + thuong

    def tinh_thue(self, tong_thu_nhap):
        giam_tru = 11000000
        thue = 0.1 * max(0, tong_thu_nhap - giam_tru)
        return thue

    def tinh_ho_tro(self):
        nam_hien_tai = 2025
        so_nam = nam_hien_tai - self.ngay_bat_dau
        ho_tro = 0
        if so_nam > 10:
            ho_tro += so_nam * 10000000
        elif so_nam > 5:
            ho_tro += so_nam * 5000000
        if self.vi_tri.lower() == "quan ly du an":
            ho_tro += 3000000
        return ho_tro

    def hien_thi(self, loai_du_an):
        print("MÃ£ há»£p Ä‘á»“ng:", self.ma_hd)
        print("Há» tÃªn:", self.ho_ten)
        print("Vá»‹ trÃ­:", self.vi_tri)
        print("LÆ°Æ¡ng cÆ¡ báº£n:", self.luong_cb)
        print("Phá»¥ cáº¥p:", self.phu_cap)

        tong_thu_nhap = self.tinh_tong_thu_nhap(loai_du_an)
        thue = self.tinh_thue(tong_thu_nhap)
        ho_tro = self.tinh_ho_tro()

        print("Tá»•ng thu nháº­p:", tong_thu_nhap)
        print("Thuáº¿ TNCN:", thue)
        print("Há»— trá»£ nhÃ¢n viÃªn:", ho_tro)

ngay_bat_dau = input("NgÃ y báº¯t Ä‘áº§u (nÄƒm):")

Gá»£i Ã½:

- CÃ³ thá»ƒ tÃ¡ch pháº§n nháº­p dá»¯ liá»‡u vÃ  xá»­ lÃ½ chÃ­nh thÃ nh hÃ m `main()` Ä‘á»ƒ tÄƒng tÃ­nh mÃ´-Ä‘un.

Tá»•ng thá»ƒ: BÃ i lÃ m tá»‘t, thá»ƒ hiá»‡n náº¯m cháº¯c kiáº¿n thá»©c cÆ¡ báº£n OOP vÃ  cÃ¡c yÃªu cáº§u bÃ i toÃ¡n. Cáº§n bá»• sung thÃªm pháº§n xá»­ lÃ½ lá»—i vÃ  kiá»ƒm tra dá»¯ liá»‡u Ä‘á»ƒ chÆ°Æ¡ng trÃ¬nh hoÃ n chá»‰nh, an toÃ n vÃ  linh hoáº¡t hÆ¡n.
